department: Innovation Science and Economic Development Canada
full_summary:
================================================ latest government tender announcement ==============================================================

### Project Number: IC206396

* **Project Title/Chef de Projet:** Information Technology Consultation Services  
* **Publication Date/Date Publication:** April 25, 2023  
* **Tender Closing Date/Appel Offres Date Cloture:** May 9, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)  

View the complete tender notice at [Tender Notice Website][tender-notice].

### Project Details/Carton Releve Projets

* **Contractor/Entrepreneur:** Innovation Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED)  
* **Location/Région:** National Capital Region (NCR)  
* **Expected Start and End Dates:** June 12, 2023 - June 11, 2024  

This RFP is a result of a Supply Arrangement and follows the Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering.

The following trade agreements are applicable: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

### Selection Criteria/Sélection des Criteres

* **Cote Combinée-Colorimore:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
